name: kparrish.github.io
body:
### About me
I am currently a Doctorate in Mechanical Engineering at Carnegie Mellon University. I am co-advised under [Alan McGaughey](http://www.cmu.edu/me/people/alan-j-h-mcgaughey.html) ([Nanoscale Transport Phenonmena Laboratory](http://ntpl.me.cmu.edu/)) and [Jonathan Malen](http://www.cmu.edu/me/people/jonathan-a-malen.html) ([Thermal Energy Engineering Laboratory](http://www.cmu.edu/me/malen/Lab_Website/Home.html)). My current research focuses on [phonon](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phonon) transport in strained crystalline systems.

You can find me on [github](http://www.github.com/kparrish) and [Linkedin](http://www.linkedin.com/pub/kevin-parrish/58/86a/b27)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
